resources.title: Coursera
resources.description: University-partnered courses, Professional Certificates, Specializations, degrees. Excellent for AI, Data Science, Digital Marketing, IT, Project Management.

resources.title: edX
resources.description: University-level courses, MicroBachelors, MicroMasters, Professional Certificates. Strong in Computer Science, Data Science, Business, and STEM.

resources.title: Udemy
resources.description: Massive library of courses taught by independent instructors. Great for practical skills, coding, design, business, and personal development.

resources.title: Skillshare
resources.description: Focus on creative skills (design, writing, photography), but also offers business and technology. Subscription model.

resources.title: LinkedIn Learning
resources.description: Business, technology, and creative skills. High-quality instructors, often integrated with LinkedIn profiles.

resources.title: Codecademy
resources.description: Interactive coding lessons. Excellent for learning programming languages (Python, JavaScript, SQL), web development, and data science fundamentals.

resources.title: Udacity
resources.description: "Nanodegree" programs for in-demand tech skills (AI, ML, Data Science, Web Dev, Cloud). Project-based learning with mentor support.

resources.description: Professional certifications in Project Management (PMP, CAPM), Cybersecurity, Digital Marketing, Cloud, Data Science.

resources.title: Pluralsight
